survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Home Internet Services
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers regarding their satisfaction with their home internet service provider, focusing on reliability, speed, customer support, and overall experience.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall performance of your home internet service?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall performance of your home internet service?

questions.question_text: How often do you experience internet outages or disruptions?
questions.client_notes: Provide clear frequency options to assess reliability.

script.question_text: How often do you experience internet outages or disruptions?

questions.question_text: Which of the following issues have you encountered with your home internet service? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to identify common pain points.

script.question_text: Which of the following issues have you encountered with your home internet service? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the customer support provided by your internet service provider?
questions.client_notes: Assess customer support quality using a 5-point scale.

script.question_text: How would you rate the customer support provided by your internet service provider?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your home internet service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Open-text question with a text input field.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your home internet service?
